title: @ Riot. Can we expect a Lissandra skin soon?
body: I for one, am I big fan of Lissandra. Her Icy theme and personality. Her skins though, are a bit lacking to me. I'm looking for a Lissandra skin that gives an extra OOMPH to her character. It's been over a year and a half since her last skin was released, and I'm asking if anything is being prepared for the Ice Witch?

replies.body:
Hiya Boomerangbro! 

We don't generally discuss what may or may not be in the pipeline for a champion. Internal timelines may change, and in rare occasions, the idea we had just doesn't work out. :c (An example of this would be Cyber Katarina wayyy back in the day - it just didn't meet what we wanted to accomplish.)

That said, she is on the list of champions who can receive a skin, and she's definitely on the radar as a champion who hasn't had a skin in a while!

Thank you Katey! Also, once I read my post before, it kinda sounded like I was dissing the skins, but I actually really do like her skins, just that I'm looking for a little more POP! 

Thank you for your reply!
No, no, you didn't come off harsh. I agree that she could use something with a bit more odds and ends. ^-^
Is Karma also on that list? :)
It hasn't been nearly as long for Karma, but she's eligible for a skin. :P
